hero-section.title: Attract more guests and increase profits with GURMAN.KZ
hero-section.desc: Connect your restaurant to our innovative loyalty platform and gain access to new customers, analytics, and convenient growth tools.

advantages-section.name: Advantages
advantages-section.bonus-system-desc: Attract and retain customers with various bonuses: welcome, accumulative, referral, birthday, and many more.
advantages-section.analytics-desc: Get detailed statistics: how many regular guests you have, average check, visit dynamics, and promotion effectiveness.
advantages-section.views-desc: Your restaurant will be featured in rankings, the best venues list, and recommended to platform users.
advantages-section.booking-desc: Customers can view your menu, place pre-orders, and book tables via an interactive hall scheme.
advantages-section.crm-desc: Automatic accrual and deduction of bonuses, data synchronization with CRM for convenient accounting.
advantages-section.reviews-desc: Monitor guest opinions, respond to reviews, and improve your restaurant’s rating.
advantages-section.bonus-card-desc: Your promotions and special offers can be promoted through push notifications and advertising campaigns within Gurman.kz!

news-section.integration-title: Gurman.kz integrates with a new POS system!
news-section.integration-desc: Now Gurman.kz can be integrated with the new Paloma365 POS system!

reviews-section.1: We've been working with Gurman.kz for several months now, and it's the best service for the restaurant business! The platform is user-friendly, helps attract new customers, and increases orders. Support is top-notch!
reviews-section.2: Thanks to Gurman.kz, more people have learned about our venue, and regular customers have started ordering more frequently. Easy integration, convenient analytics tools — everything needed for a successful business!
reviews-section.3: A very convenient platform for restaurants! You can easily upload a menu, track orders, and interact with customers. Lacked some flexibility in settings, but overall, we’re satisfied.
reviews-section.4: Gurman.kz is a real gem! Now you can order food from your favorite restaurants in just a few clicks, without dealing with websites or calls. Everything is fast, convenient, and hassle-free.
reviews-section.5: Finally, a service that cares about quality! Orders arrive on time, dishes are fresh, and the bonus program is a nice touch.
reviews-section.6: Overall, it's great! Huge selection of restaurants, user-friendly interface, but sometimes there are delivery delays. Hope the service keeps improving!
